A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Signed up for an account just to review this movie for two reasons; 1\, I'm really getting tired of how badly skewed the Rotten Tomatoes critics are (I wish we could review them) and 2\, this is by far my least favorite Star Wars movie ever (yes I liked Episode 1 better).

From the very beginning this movie gave me a feeling of "this is just stupid" and just when it would have a moment of awesomeness (yea there were a few) it would be marred with "really? that's where they're going?

I don't want to reveal any spoilers so I won't go into specifics but there was a whole lot of bad with not near enough good sprinkled on to make it a worthwhile movie.  At least I did the double feature so my ticket price wasn't completely wasted since i got to see Episode 7 in theaters again but I've already returned the tickets i had bought to see it a second time.

I'm really glad JJ is coming back for Episode 9 and I'll likely wait for bluray for Rian's non saga trilogy since I think he really s**t the bed with this one.
